mapper.select: select * from essayboard order by essayNo desc
mapper.insert: insert into essayboard (essayTitle, essayShortTitle, essayContent, essayWriter) values (#{essayTitle}, #{essayShortTitle}, #{essayContent}, #{essayWriter})
mapper.select: select essayNo, essayTitle, essayShortTitle, essayContent, essayWriter, essayregDate, essayViewCnt from essayboard where essayNo = #{essayNo}
select essayNo, essayTitle, essayWriter, essayregDate, essayViewCnt from essayboard order by essayNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select essayNo, essayTitle, essayWriter, essayregDate, essayViewCnt from essayboard
where essayTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where essayContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where essayTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or essayContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
where essayWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
order by essayNo desc limit #{displayPost}, #{postNum}

select count(essayNo) from essayboard
WHERE essayTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE essayContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE essayTitle LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%') or essayContent LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
WHERE essayWriter LIKE concat('%', #{keyword}, '%')
